ARABIC: قَالَ ٱذْهَبْ فَمَن تَبِعَكَ مِنْهُمْ فَإِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ جَزَآؤُكُمْ جَزَآءً مَّوْفُورًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'Go! And as for any who follow you, your repayment is Hell, repayment in full!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (And God) said: "Away! Whosoever of them follows you will surely have Hell with you as requital -- an ample recompense.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Thereupon He retorted: "Be gone! Hell shall be the recompense - and a most ample one - of whosoever of them who follows you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God said, "Go away. All those who follow you will have hell as ample recompense for their deeds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “Be gone – therefore whoever among them follows you – so hell is the recompense for you all, a sufficient punishment.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (Allah) said: "Go, and whosoever of them follows you, surely, Hell will be the recompense of you (all) an ample recompense.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: Be gone! for whoever of them will follow you, then surely hell is your recompense, a full recompense:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Said He, 'Depart! Those of them that follow thee -- surely Gehenna shall be your recompense, an ample recompense!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: Go, and whosoever of them followeth thee - lo! hell will be your payment, ample payment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: God said, "Go away! Hell will be your reward and the reward of any of them who follow you -- an ample recompense.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Allah said: be thou gone; then who soever of them followeth thee, Hell is your meed, a meed ample.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Said He, ‘Begone! Whoever of them follows you, indeed the hell shall be your requital, an ample reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Allah) said: "Go thy way; if any of them follow thee, verily Hell will be the recompense of you (all)- an ample recompense.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (Allah) said: "Go, and whosoever of them follows you, surely! Hell will be the recompense of you (all) an ample recompense.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Begone' said He. 'Indeed, Gehenna is your recompense, and the reward of those who follow you, an ample recompense.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “Begone! Whoever of them follows you—Hell is your reward, an ample reward.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Allah] said, "Go, for whoever of them follows you, indeed Hell will be the recompense of you - an ample recompense.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [17:63] Said He, exalted be He, to him [Iblīs]: ‘Begone, deferred to the time of the First Blast [of the Trumpet]. Whoever of them follows you — indeed Hell shall be your requital, [both] yours and theirs, a requital [that is indeed] ample, sufficient and complete.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said: Go, and) Allah said to him: and know that (whosoever of them followeth thee) in your religion (lo! your payment, ample payment) an abundant portion.
